content:
Hi,

I would like to know if anyone did something like chat templates.
I mean predefined content of messege which user can pick from.. ?

And if no one's been looking into it then what should be the way how to do it. Ofcourse its possible that user have some text in notepad and then copy-paste them into text..

Thanks for reply :-)
@Vojtech Brothanek: Can you talk a little about your use case for these templates?

@Alex Vandiver
we've done the integration with the GSM gateway.
We have a stream "sms" where we have individual topics that are mobile numbers. And we receive and send text messages through these tops.
Our client, for whom we did this, asks if we are able to do this in the Zulip, or some other way. They often send the same message content to multiple topcis..
@Vojtech Brothanek: I can see why that would make sense for that use case, but Zulip doesn't have any built-in functionality for that.
I have been wanting template messages as a feature myself, just to save useful links I often want to include in messages and the like.

@Tim Abbott @Alex Vandiver
Yes, I think for some use case scenarios is pretty good idea. But I know it's not something that is much important. If you would consider to implement this feature it would be awesome :)
Алексей Малахов has marked this topic as resolved.
